messages.content: Is Shanghai Jiao Tong University mainly focusing on research about Jiao Tong, i.e. transportation

Shanghai Jiao Tong University is one of the top 5 universities in China, and it is mainly focused on research about Jiao Tong, i.e. transportation. It has 12 colleges and aGraduate School. It was founded in 1911 and is located in the city of Shanghai.
Then what's the best in China, in case this is the second
The best Chinese University is probably Peking University, which is also known as Beijing University.
Then what's the best university in Shanghai
Shanghai Jiao Tong University is the best university in Shanghai. It was founded in 1911 and is located in the city of Shanghai.
